section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: These rules may be cited as the Matrimonial Causes (Fees) Rules.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Fees payable
section.leadIn: The fees specified in the Schedule shall be payable in all proceedings taken under the Ordinance:
section.proviso: Provided that where no provision is made by these rules for any matter for which provision is made by the High Court Fees Rules (Cap. 4 sub. leg. D), the fees prescribed by the latter rules shall apply in relation to such matter in proceedings under the Ordinance.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Means of payment
section.content: The fees shall be payable either by means of adhesive stamps or in money, in which case the relevant documents shall be franked with the amount of the fees paid.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Transitional provision relating to the Matrimonial Causes (Fees)(Amendment) Rules 2009
section.leadIn: Where a party entitled to require any costs to be taxed has obtained an appointment to tax before the commencement* of rule 3(b) and (c) (the amending rule) of the Matrimonial Causes (Fees) (Amendment) Rules 2009 (L.N. 48 of 2009)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: nothing in the amending rule applies in relation to the taxation; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: item 13 in the Schedule as in force immediately before the commencement of the amending rule continues to apply in relation to the taxation as if it had not been amended by the amending rule.
